info.name: XDA 2013 to 2010
info.description:
Makes the "XDA 2013 Beta - 1024" XDA theme look more like "XDA 2010". For those who prefer the old fonts and colors, but still want all the new features of the 2013 theme (e.g. DevDB).

Make sure you're using the "XDA 2013 Beta - 1024" theme on XDA to use this userstyle correctly.

XDA Thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=46766653
info.additionalInfo: 07-12-2013: Fixes: corrected some colors, made the text smaller for buttons so it doesn't overflow anymore, other minor fixes. Improvements: more themed buttons, some icons replaced, other minor changes. 12-11-2013: Minor fixes. A capital was causing the userstyle not to apply correctly for Chrome users, should be fine now. 24-10-2013: Initial release.
